resources.string: Weyland-Yutani is a monolithic corporation, and is often referred to as simply \"The Company\" for this reason. They are the primary suppliers of global technology, and hold extensive assets in space exploration, mining, colonization, trade, etc., to the point of outright monopolization. Their branding appears on everything from starships to space heaters and children\'s toys.
Tokyo, London, San Francisco, Sea of Tranquillity, Thedus
Image shows a part of a future city
